name: Word Play (FrogSquare)
description:
Word Play is a puzzle game that will challenge your brain and test all your search and vocab skills.

The goal is to find all the hidden words on the puzzle board. Select letters by tap and drag. To pass a level find all the words listed on the board. Improve your vocabulary, spelling and puzzle skills.

With 160+ levels with different categories to connect letters building unique words WordPlay pushes your focus to its limit but keeps your interest.

Level difficulty will be increased gradually as you progress with different category.

We hope you have fun and joy with our game!

Support email: ravone@frogsquare.com
